home.title: Wedding Diary ‚Äì From Engagement to the Altar
home.subtitle: Professional wedding planning in an elegant diary
home.description: Keep everything under control with our comprehensive wedding diary. From the first thought of engagement to the last dance at the wedding.

basic.name: Basic Wedding Diary
basic.description: Complete wedding planning guide with professional templates
basic.whatYouFind: What you'll find in the diary?
basic.checklistsDesc: Structured task lists for each month of preparation. Never forget important dates, reservations, or purchases.
basic.budgetDesc: Clear expense tracking by categories with graphs and saving tips. Always have an overview of your budget.
basic.guestsDesc: Complete system for managing invitations, tracking responses, and special guest requirements.
basic.timelineDesc: Detailed timeline of the entire day with time buffers and space for notes. Professional tips for smooth running.
basic.tipsDesc: Advice from wedding planners for solving common situations and crisis scenarios during preparations and the big day.
basic.notesDesc: Space for your personal notes, ideas, and inspiration throughout the entire wedding planning process.

premium.name: Premium Wedding Diary
premium.description: Luxury wedding diary with premium packaging and special features
premium.giftMessage: Perfect gift for your loved one

stressFree.title: Stress-free
stressFree.desc: Keep everything under control. With our diary, you'll never forget important dates or tasks.

elegantDesign.title: Elegant design
elegantDesign.desc: Professionally designed diary that looks great and is a joy to use during planning.

lifetimeMemory.title: Lifetime memory
lifetimeMemory.desc: Preserve all memories from your wedding preparations in a beautiful and practical diary.

perfectGift.title: Perfect gift
perfectGift.desc: Ideal gift for the bride or groom that will help them organize their special day.

cta.description: Get your wedding diary today and start planning the wedding you've always dreamed of.

about.title: About the wedding diary
about.description: Our wedding diary is created with love for all couples who want to have their wedding perfectly organized.
